places_with_reviews.name: Bhrushund - Ganesh Temple, Mendha
places_with_reviews.address: Nehru ward, 5MF6+CXX, Mendha Rd, Santaji Nagar, Bhandara, Maharashtra 441904, India

reviews.text:
Bhrushund Ganesh Temple in Bhandara is one of the Ashta-Vinayaks of Vidarbha.
Legend has it that one of the ardent devotees of Lord Ganesh got converted into a statue of the Lord himself.
Bhandara is 65 KM away from Nagpur on Nagpur –Raipur highway. It is situated on the bank of Vainganga River.
It is the unique example in the world how a devotee gets converted into God. It is a very pleasent to place. Back side of temple is hemadpanthi construction about 4 years ago.very very beautiful.. must see when u come to this temple...but needs maintenance.
It is said that one who visits Ganesh temple and pray here would gets all the powers.
Oldest Ganesha temple of Bhandara district place of worship 🙏

THIS IS THE TEMPLE OF LORD GANESHA.IT IS ONE OF AASTAVINAYAK IN VIDARBHA REGION.THE TEMPLE HAS ANCIENT HISTORY.

The atmosphere out of mandir is not that good... There is much more chances of development
Very old temple. One of the eight "Ashtvinayak"  of Vidarbh Region. Nice to visit. The outside premise is quite crowdy.
One of the famous Ashtavinayakas Of Vidarbha, very ancient Ganesh Temple. ... It is located in Mendha area of Bhandara town, which is the district headquarter. Bhandara is 65 KM away from Nagpur .

places_with_reviews.name: Gandhi Square
places_with_reviews.address: 5MC4+6G8, MH SH 271, Santaji Nagar, Bhandara, Maharashtra 441904, India

reviews.text: Crowded place, main market and square of Bhandara city. Theatre is there. Many hawkers  you can see to buy anything. Very busy always either weekend or weekday. Shops, hotels, restaurants and so many things.

Most busy place & any one can guess this Gandhi Chowk play the role of heart junction place in the body of Bhandara.
Nowadays which way it's constructed by roads & buildings, it provide proud feeling than old Gandhi Chowk of Bhandara.
For future still development of  surroundings is going on.
Most busy square in bhandara.....if u have a control pn ur two wheeler then only u can drive into it... otherwise don't go there with vehicle
Famous and very crowded place. This square known as Gandhi Chowk

happening place in bhandara
It is full of traffic -- vendors for snacks , vegetables, flowers , cloths and what not
Use scooter or go for street walk

places_with_reviews.name: Ambai nimbai mata mandir,bhandara
places_with_reviews.address: 5MF4+2HV, Santaji Ward, Santaji Nagar, Bhandara, Maharashtra 441904, India

reviews.text: Must visit once

The temple of Maa Ambai Nimbai Mata is located in Bhandara city, 60 km from Nagpur. This temple is about 1000 years old and the idol of Mata Ji is about 800 years old. The idols of Mata Ji are made in Hemadpanthi style and came into existence during the rule of Gond dynasty. According to the old saying, about 800 years ago, there were two trees, one of mango and one of neem, due to a strong storm both the trees fell, after that two statues appeared from between the two trees which were known as Maa Ambai and Nimbai. . Ambai is the form of mango tree and Nimbai is the form of Neem tree. Jai Mata Di.
The wait of years was completed with the darshan of Mata Ji.

places_with_reviews.name: Tulja Bhawani Temple, Khokarla
places_with_reviews.address: 5JJM+CFV, Rajni Nagar, Bhandara, Khokurala, Maharashtra 441906, India

reviews.text:
Hindu temple
Aai Tulaja Bhawani Temple
Peaceful place.
A big hall behind the temple...
Which can be provided on rent for small functions...
Like birthday,janosa,sakshagandha ,etc
Plz contact Mandir pujari
Silent and peaceful surrounding not crowded so we can sit there for long time.

This temple is located on Khat road. If you are going to Ramtek then this Temple will be locate in right side and if you are coming to Bhandara from Khat or Ramtek road then Temple will be located on the left side. Near about 100 meter road is improper. Temple is so beautiful, surrounding is clean, not so crowded area. The parking area is extremely big.
It is only temple of godess TULJA BHAVANI IN BHANDARA TRY TO VISIT YOU WILL GET SPIRITUAL FEELINGS
Beautiful temple and very nicely maintained. Jai tulja bhawani
